page.title: 14TOURISM
page.content:
The area is gradually being opened up to tourism. An{equestrian}centre at Norland near to the{Hobbit}pub caters for locals, and for tourists during the summer.
The area is also becoming increasingly popular with{cyclists,}and{walkers.} They can savour the countryside and sample the refreshments of the local hostelries.
The new sport of{BMX cycling}is proving popular on a new track on the edge of Norland Moor.
The local Borough of{Calderdale} provides guides and booklets providing a wealth of information for the tourist.
